ygData.subject: Re: items site?
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay, If I would have my dream site for equiptment and such Level based - what equiptment armor/weapons = someone who is wondering what to get at each
ygData.messageBody:
Okay,

If I would have my dream site for equiptment and such

Level based - what equiptment armor/weapons => someone who is wondering
what to get at each level(s) could go there and see.
Stat impoving - say I want to know how to up my stats for str, agi, dex,
sta what weapons/armor/jewelry/misc - where/who/how to get plus some
explinations about how each stat improvement can improve warrior's
performance.
Quest based - items that can only be gotten through quests
Purchasable items - average pricing
Player Trade/purchased - price should pay for these

That site I like for the message board. Get good tips and such from
there.

Suz
